column1: For orders below this amount this payment method is unavailable.
column2: "Voor bestellingen beneden dit bedrag zal deze betaalmethode niet beschikbaar zijn."

column1: For orders above this amount this payment method is unavailable. Yehhpay does not accept orders over € 300.
column2: "Voor bestellingen boven dit bedrag zal deze betaalmethode niet beschikbaar zijn. Yehhpay accepteert orders tot maximaal € 300

column1: Not approved by consumer or Yehhpay
Check on billing and delivery addresses
Yehhpay requires that your billing and sipping address are the same.
column2: "Yehhpay vereist dat uw factuuradres en uw verzendadres gelijk zijn."

column1: Yehhpay transaction is not completed and approved. Please try to re-order.
column2: "De Yehhpay transactie is nog niet afgerond. Probeer het opnieuw."

column1:
Need help?

This is the official Yehhpay extension for Magento 1. The extension is developed by Wezz e-Commerce. Do you need help? Read our documentation, FAQ or ask us a question.

Signup and Authentification

Don't have an account yet? Obtain your account credentials here. (new window)
column2:
Hulp nodig?
